price: يقيناً بې ځايه لګښت كوونكي د شيطانانو ورونه دي، او شيطان خو د خپل رب ناشكره دى.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُبَذِّرِينَ كَانُوٓاْ إِخۡوَٰنَ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينِۖ وَكَانَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ لِرَبِّهِۦ كَفُورٗا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: inna al-mubadhirīna kānū ikh'wāna al-shayāṭīni wakāna al-shayṭānu lirabbihi kafūran
